trans-unit.target: TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_SEQ_00<tab><var 48 F201FC /var><var 49 F201FD /var> Quest Sync<var 49 01 /var><var 48 01 /var> This creator recognizes you...or does he?
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_TODO_00<tab>Deliver the nameless red fruit to the observers.
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_TODO_01<tab>Speak with the pompous creator.
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_000<tab>Azem? What in the blazes are you doing here? Hold on─ You seem...thinner somehow.
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_001<tab>Hmm... You have much in common with <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> but it's clear you're not one of us. A familiar perhaps?

TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_002<tab>I suppose it's just like <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((him)) /var> to send one of <var 08 E905 ((her)) ((his)) /var> minions to poke its nose into our affairs. But since you're here, instead of hanging around like a bad smell, why don't you make yourself useful?
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_003<tab>I want you to take this latest work of mine─a new variety of fruit─to my colleagues.

TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_004<tab>In the meantime, I will be cultivating more specimens in the Cthonic Horns. Yes, you heard that correctly. Cultivating, not simply conjuring with creation magicks. Aye, the fruit I produce is a labor of love.

TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_005<tab>Now that my newest masterpiece is close to completion, I would have my fellow researchers sample its delights. I wish to hear their impressions before I make the final adjustments.

TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_006<tab>Unfortunately, for all their wisdom, I find them intolerable at the best of times, never mind when they are critiquing my work. For that reason, I would have you go in my stead. And be quick about it─lest the fruit spoil as a result of your dawdling.
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_010<tab>Yes? Is something the matter? I've already given you your instructions, and I'd prefer not to repeat myself. Now go.
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERA04285_000_020<tab>You are the familiar who arrived with Emet-Selch and Hythlodaeus, yes? And what do we have here?
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERA04285_000_021<tab>A new species of fruit, eh? Let us hope it tastes better than it looks.
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERA04285_000_022<tab>My word!
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERA04285_000_023<tab>What an unusual flavor! Equal parts bitter, musty, and tart...and not entirely unpleasant. I am curious to know how such a thing was created.

TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERA04285_000_024<tab>Grown from seed in the Cthonic Horns, you say? In my experience, leaving such things to nature leads to wildly varying results. To have bred such a specimen must've been incredibly time-consuming, not to mention inefficient.
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERB04285_000_030<tab>You wish to speak with me?
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERB04285_000_031<tab>My impressions? Very well.
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERB04285_000_032<tab>Good gracious, what...is this!?
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERB04285_000_033<tab>It's so outrageously bitter, something akin to a wave of icy cold has spread throughout my entire body!
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERB04285_000_034<tab>I certainly wouldn't eat this out of choice, but it could be made into medicine for staving off the heat in arid environments.
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERC04285_000_040<tab>Are you lost, little familiar?
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERC04285_000_041<tab>For me? Why yes, I should love to try a piece!
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERC04285_000_042<tab>Hmm...
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERC04285_000_043<tab>I don't mean to be rude, but this falls somewhere between “rather foul” and “positively revolting.” It's so bitter, it's practically inedible.

TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_OBSERVERC04285_000_044<tab>More important, however, is the question of whether this fruit would serve its intended function. If wild animals cannot bring themselves to eat it, the seeds will never be spread. I can't imagine this creation being approved in its current state.
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_050<tab>You are returned, minus three fruit samples, I presume?

TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_051<tab>Is that so? Not one of them found it to their liking? They claimed my last attempt was too sweet, and now it's too bitter!? Honestly, the nerve of these so-called experts!
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_052<tab>As they shall soon learn, I am not so easily deterred.
TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_053<tab>For my next creation, I'll cross-pollinate sour and sweet varieties, and see what they have to say about <var 1A 02 /var>that<var 1A 01 /var>!

TEXT_AKTKZG010_04285_ELEGANCECREATOR04285_000_054<tab>I'll show them it's these “wildly varying results” that come from adherence to natural processes that have the power to defy expectations! And as the familiar of Azem <var 08 E905 ((herself)) ((himself)) /var>, I'm sure you can appreciate that!
